# segmentSize

**Instance Property**

The maximum number of indexes that are loaded each time the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/tvmljs/datasource/datasource/3192119-loadindexes] event is triggered.

## Declaration

```swift
readonly attribute int segmentSize;
```

## Discussion

This property allows you to adjust the number of indexes to be loaded according to the capabilities of your server endpoints.

The `segmentSize` attribute defaults to 20 indexes.

## Loading Elements

- **loadindexes**: An event type that tells the data source to load its indexes.
